TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

summary.span: Die -Klasse stellt einen AD LDS-Instanzserver dar.

span.span: The class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Die -Klasse bezieht sich auf Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS) umbenannt wurde auf Active Directory Anwendung Modus (ADAM).The class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

span.span: Demand value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

summary.span: Ruft die Konsistenzprüfung (KCC; Knowledge Consistency Checker) auf, die die Replikationstopologie für diese AD LDS-Instanz überprüft.

span.span: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Weitere Informationen finden Sie im Thema "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in der MSDN Library unter [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
